content.raw:
Task 3 checkpoint 4 fails to succeed even though leak detector has been picked up.

A simple way to reproduce this it to teleport Valkyre to checkpoint 4 and manually place the detector on the palm. Topic `/srcsim/finals/task` does not report the transition to checkpoint 5.

A nasty side effect of this is that now I'm not able to get readings from the detector since checkpoint 5 is never reached.

Currently working with the latest released versions of srcsim (0.6.0) and gazebo7 (7.8.0).
